title: AnythingLLM Agent Skill Plugin Manifest Schema

active.description: Determines if the custom agent skill is active.

hubId.description: Used to identify the custom agent skill. Must be the same as the parent folder name.

name.description: The human-readable name of the skill displayed in the AnythingLLM UI.

schema.description: Must be 'skill-1.0.0'. May be updated on manifest spec changes.

version.description: Version of the custom agent skill, defined by the user.

description.description: Short description of the custom agent skill.

author.description: Author tag of the custom agent skill.

author_url.description: URL of the author of the custom agent skill.

license.description: License of the custom agent skill.

required.description: Indicates if the argument is required.

type.description: Type of input to be rendered.

setup_args.description: Setup arguments used to configure the custom agent skill from the UI and make runtime arguments accessible in the handler.js file when the skill is called.

prompt.description: Example prompt for the custom agent skill.

call.description: Expected invocation format matching the input format of the custom agent skill.

examples.description: Array of examples used to pre-inject examples into the custom agent skill.

file.description: Location of the file to be executed relative to the plugin.json file.

description.description: Short description of the parameter's purpose.

params.description: Parameters expected by the custom agent skill.

entrypoint.description: Defines the entrypoint of the custom agent skill and the expected inputs.
